content.text:
# 1st Parliament of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus

This is a list of members of parliament (MPs) elected to the Assembly of the Republic for the 1st Parliament of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus at the 1985 parliamentary election, which was held on 23 June 1985.
The list below indicates the MPs in the parties in which they were elected.
{| class=wikitable style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background-color:#f7f8ff; padding:0px; font-size:90%;"
|-
! colspan="2"|Party
! Members
! Change
! Proportion
|-
| style="background: #FF7F00" | || National Unity Party || 24 || 6 || 48%
|-
| style="background: #008000" | || Republican Turkish Party || 12 || 7  || 24%
|-
| style="background: #B22222" | || Communal Liberation Party || 10 || 3 || 20%
|-
| style="background: #FFFF00" | || New Dawn Party || 4 || new || 8%
|-
| colspan="2" | Total || 50 || || 100%
|-
